Great little tapas bar with good food and wine! Very welcoming vibe with an American bistro feel to it! The kitchen opens until 11:30, which was a plus since we found this restaurant after an 8-hour fast!  I loved the old school charm in the restaurant.  We ordered 3-4 tapas to share plus a bottle of white wine to go with our meal!  The food came out quickly given that the kitchen was closing.  We ordered cheese with foie gras and pear, garlic mushrooms, Catalan tomato bread and a meat dish.  Everything was very tasty and satisfying!  I especially liked the tomato bread!  The prices were very reasonable for the portions you get.  Overall, this is a decent restaurant with good food for late night dining!
